code: import React from"react";import{useLanguage}from"./LanguageContext";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const LanguageSwitcher=()=>{const{language,switchLanguage}=useLanguage();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex gap-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>switchLanguage("en"),className:`p-2 rounded ${language==="en"?"bg-blue-600 text-white":"bg-gray-200 text-gray-800"}`,children:"EN"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>switchLanguage("cs"),className:`p-2 rounded ${language==="cs"?"bg-blue-600 text-white":"bg-gray-200 text-gray-800"}`,children:"CS"})]});};export default LanguageSwitcher;
